title: Product Comparison Matrix Configuration
description: Example configuration for comprehensive product comparison analysis using industry benchmark datasets

_comments.datasets: Configure paths to industry benchmark datasets. SWE-bench Verified provides 2,294 task-level queries, CoIR provides 15,678 retrieval queries, CodeSearchNet provides 10,547 NL queries, and CoSQA provides 1,160 QA queries for a total of 29,679 comparison queries.
_comments.comparison_scope: Options: 'smoke' (500 representative queries), 'focused' (LSP-specific queries only), 'full' (all available queries with capacity subsampling)
_comments.stratification_method: Options: 'balanced' (equal representation across strata), 'proportional' (proportional to dataset sizes), 'minimal' (basic stratification)

statistical_config.bootstrap_samples: Number of bootstrap resamples for confidence intervals. 5000 provides stable estimates.
statistical_config.mde_threshold: Minimum detectable effect size. 0.02 means 2% improvement detection threshold.
statistical_config.power_requirement: Statistical power target. 0.8 means 80% chance of detecting true effects.

quality_gates.min_sample_size: Minimum queries per stratum for valid statistical analysis
quality_gates.baseline_stability_threshold: Maximum acceptable baseline drift between runs
